doc.title: BYkids: Mozambique
doc.plot: The first BYkids' film is being made by 16-year-old Alcides Soares, who lives in Mozambique and lost both parents to AIDS. During the month of August 2007, Alcides was mentored by Neal Baer (Executive Producer of Law & Order: SVU) and Chris Zalla (2007 Sundance Grand Jury Prize winner) to make this film about his life. His story symbolizes the drama of a whole generation in Africa.
